title: League of Legends Year Book
body: I think Riot should make a year book with all the champion and end of the year quotes. I don't know i think it will be pretty cool and something new!

replies.body:
I think this would be done better by the community than Riot.
If we decide to make a "yearbook" at the end of each season, the champion quotes should be based on how the patches affected them, and I think it'd be a lot better if the players have a say in it.

I really love this idea. 

It'd be different every season, and I'd be really curious to see the player sentiment for each champion at the end of the season.

BRB, making boards post to get quotes!

**EDIT:** [Let's do this!](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/gmzeYfTh-league-of-legends-year-book)
Thanks for the support! It will be great if everyone can get a part of this!

I love the results of the post! Thanks for suggesting this - the responses have been hilarious. I'm thinking about compiling all the responses into a more digestible format - maybe an actual yearbook?!
That sounds like a great idea!
Also give some credits to Dabootyyyy because he was the one who came up with it!
